mapper.select: select product.pro_id,product.pro_name,product.pro_guige,product.pro_money,product.pro_say, sum(pro_ck.pro_ck_number) as pro_ck_numbersum from product left join pro_ck on pro_ck.pro_id=product.pro_id group by product.pro_id

select p.pro_id,p.pro_name,p.pro_guige,p.pro_money,p.pro_say, sum(pro_ck.pro_ck_number) as pro_ck_numbersum from product p left join pro_ck on pro_ck.pro_id=p.pro_id left join ck on ck.ck_id=pro_ck.ck_id left join pro_cat on pro_cat.pro_id=p.pro_id left join category on category.cat_id=pro_cat.cat_id
p.pro_name like '%${param1}%'
and category.cat_name like '%${param2}%'
and ck.ck_name like '%${param3}%'
group by p.pro_id

select product.pro_id,product.pro_name,product.pro_guige,product.pro_money,product.pro_say, sum(pro_ck.pro_ck_number) as pro_ck_numbersum from product left join pro_ck on pro_ck.pro_id=product.pro_id left join ck on ck.ck_id=pro_ck.ck_id left join pro_cat on pro_cat.pro_id=product.pro_id left join category on category.cat_id=pro_cat.cat_id where category.cat_name=#{cat_name} group by product.pro_id

select product.pro_id,product.pro_name,product.pro_guige,product.pro_money,product.pro_say, pro_ck.pro_ck_number as pro_ck_numbersum from product left join pro_ck on pro_ck.pro_id=product.pro_id left join ck on ck.ck_id=pro_ck.ck_id where ck.ck_name=#{ck_name} group by product.pro_id

select product.pro_id,product.pro_name,product.pro_guige,product.pro_money,product.pro_cbj, product.pro_dw,product.pro_xh,product.pro_say, sum(pro_ck.pro_ck_number) as pro_ck_numbersum from product left join pro_ck on pro_ck.pro_id=product.pro_id left join ck on ck.ck_id=pro_ck.ck_id where product.pro_id=#{pro_id}
mapper.update: update product set pro_say=#{proSay} where pro_id=#{proId}
update pro_ck set pro_ck_number=#{proCkNumber} where ck_id=#{ckId} and pro_id=#{proId}
mapper.select: select product.pro_id,product.pro_name,product.pro_money,pro_ck.pro_ck_number as sl, pro_ck.pro_ck_number as pro_ck_numbersum from product left join pro_ck on pro_ck.pro_id=product.pro_id left join ck on ck.ck_id=pro_ck.ck_id left join pd_pro on product.pro_id=pd_pro.pro_id where pd_pro.pd_id=#{pdId} group by product.pro_id

select pro_id,pro_name,pro_guige,pro_xh,pro_dw,pro_money,pro_cbj from product where 1=1
and pro_name like '%${pro_name}%'

select pro_id,pro_name,pro_guige,pro_xh,pro_dw, pro_money,pro_cbj from product where product.pro_id not in (select pro_id from bj_pro where bjid=#{bjid})
and pro_name like '%${pro_name}%'
select pro_id from bj_pro where bjid=#{bjid}
